profile: I am a full-stack web developer with over 20 years experience across a diverse landscape of industries and proficiencies in many web technologies & frameworks including front-end (HTML/CSS/SCSS/JS), React, and the LAMP stack. I’m able to lead a project from conception through deployment, and I enjoy learning new skills and solving problems.

experience.title: Independent Contractor, RHM Interactive, Montclair, NJ
description: Designed and developed WordPress and static websites for small- & medium-sized businesses
Contracted full-stack development services to other agencies for clients such as Cabela’s, Panasonic, Heineken USA, and Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia

experience.title: Sr. Front-End Developer, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, New York, NY
description: Maintain front-end codebase (Twig and React) for entire public-facing mskcc.org website within our design system
Help architect and develop new front-end components
Guide and mentor junior developers through pair-programming and peer code reviews

experience.title: Sr. Developer, Paper Tiger Design, Ridgewood, NJ
description: Developed PHP-based integrations with WordPress and CraftCMS systems
Customized CMS for client needs based on content and editorial requirements

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer, Addison Design, New York, NY
description: Developed client- and server-side for numerous WordPress sites, including custom themes and plugins
Developed static financial reporting sites for several clients

experience.title: HTML Team Lead, Martha Stweart Living Omnimedia, New York, NY
description: Led front-end architecture for all MSLO web properties
Launched front-end re-design of MS Weddings online
Mentored teammates, providing guidance & feedback through code reviews

experience.title: Front-End Architect, Ogilvy & Mather, New York, NY
description: Developed front-end code for client & brand micro-sites
Re-architected client sites to use web standards

experience.title: Sr. Interface Developer, Fry, Inc., New York, NY
description: Developed & integrated front-end code for client e-commerce sites
Led front-end development for several redesign & rebranding efforts
Oversaw ADA-compliance initiatives for the Fry NYC office

experience.title: Sr. IT Professional, University of Vermont, Burlington, VT
description: Developed numerous Flash-based games, simulations, and lab activities
Led front-end & back-end development on several campus website initiatives
